website_summaries.verdict: It's a good choice for consumers who don't need fancy features and prefer a budget price and quiet operation over extreme air movement.
pros: A model that's basic and easy to put together and offers adjustable height
Has earned praise for being quiet and sturdy
A good option for small spaces
cons: Not as powerful as others we considered
No bells and whistles like some competing brands offer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan
customer_reviews.text: My son put this together for me, so I can't say anything about that part, but I do like it. I used it last night. I put it at the foot of the bed on oscillating, low speed. It was quiet and just enough breeze to move air. It looks nice, not cheap. I needed to move it so it would oscillate further in another direction and was amazed at how heavy it was. I gave it a nudge and it didn't give an inch, so I would say it's sturdy. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price; just wish the power cord was longer
customer_reviews.text: Fan operation is quiet and it suit my needs as a bed-side floor fan. I've found that the lowest setting is adequate for good air circulation. It's stable too. My one complaint about the product is that the power cord is a bit short--only three feet or so. This might be sufficient for most people, but if you're looking to place this anywhere that isn't pretty close to an outlet, then you're going to need to use an extension cable. The Vornado that I had for many years and that I replaced with this fan had a cord that was probably two feet longer. That said, this is cheaper, works well, and is not unattractive.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: No thrills fan that blows hard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy no thrills fan that blows hard. The base is heavy and the fan cover is made of metal and can easily snap on and off. The assembly instructions are confusing. I found it easier to just look at the pictures since the verbiage didn’t make sense. In general it’s a terrific fan at a reasonable price. It does not have all the bells and whistles like remote control and bright blue lights, which is why I chose it. Just low, medium and high power with an on and off switch. We’ll see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Threelx

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but quiet it is not.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is easy to assemble and works fine. However, the fan is loud even on low speed. Not that it rattles or anything like that, but even at low, it is blowing a lot of air and it is a lot louder than my previous fan. It's low speed sounds almost as loud as my previous fan on high. Not good if you want some white noise while you sleep, as this produces more than just a little white noise. I will move this to a different room and look for another fan.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Fan
customer_reviews.text: The box the fan was in was kinda beat up and some what old looking so I was thinking the fan would be damaged up as well but it was not long story short what I received was in my opinion was a high quality made fan for an excellent price I purchased a Holmes fan from target for more money than this and that fan was garbage in build quality compare this fan I was very happy and this fan is also quite not really noisy at all like some fans are I am glad I found this company on here as well purchased a Fan from them
customer_reviews.author: knightsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Returned it. The fan speed changed by itself, ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. The fan speed changed by itself, sometimes going so fast I thought it would spin the blades right off. The head of the fan would not stay upright. The post would never stay tight in the pedestal, had to be tightened 3 or more times a day or else it would wobble back and forth, sometimes knocking itself over. Very unstable, dangerous to have around young kids or pets.
customer_reviews.author: Alecvale

customer_reviews.title: ... it in the den while watching TV as I like less A/C than he does
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fan to use mainly outdoors on our lanai but I see my husband brings it indoors and uses it in the den while watching TV as I like less A/C than he does.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota Val

customer_reviews.title: If you like sleeping on an airport runway, this fan is for you...
customer_reviews.text: Obnoxiously loud one moment (think airplane taking off) and quiet (or as you'd expect a fan to sound) the next. It's impossible to sleep with this fan on any setting but low, and even then, it will still wake you in the night. I find a healthy dose of white noise great for sleep, but this fan is another beast - the sound is so inconsistent! I suspect the issue is caused by the fan blades being extremely flimsy rather than a typical rigid fan blade. As you might guess, I returned this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Poor volume of air pushed.
customer_reviews.text: No remote with my model. I’m disappointed in the volume of air pushed. The difference between low and high speed cooling capability is slight. I’m sorry I made this purchase. During the hot nights I get more fan noise than cooling capability when I turn up the fan speedup. With I “crank it up” I want the breeze to match the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: loud with random noises
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad fan....unless you like it randomly wooshing every 30 seconds. its almost like it speeds up and slows down on its own. I bought it because I like a fan while I sleep but this thing makes so much noise there is no way I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: j.a.c

customer_reviews.title: It can be loud.
customer_reviews.text: It moves a lot of air BUT this thing can get LOUD. Another reviewer mentioned the blade being the cause and I wouldn't doubt it. Mine starts out quiet but gets progressively louder and can get to the point of waking me up. If the noise isn't an issue for you, then you'll be happy with it - easy to assemble and does what a fan should... Just louder than most.
customer_reviews.author: LambofGoth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan? No. Worth $38? Absolutely!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is not especially quiet and it does not move tons of air. It also is not as pictured in the listing. See my photo, which shows the different graphic on the front and the absence of button controls on the stem as pictured in the listing. (Actual controls are a knob on the top of the fan enclosure.) BUT for $38?!? WORTH IT. Buy this for your bedroom or whatever unless minimal fan volume is your top priority or you have a huge room to cool or something. For most uses, this fan gets the job done perfectly adequately, and it's a large standing fan for under $40. Hard to beat that, and not worth trying, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: cbg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN & GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this fan!!!! Assembly is easy! It runs smoothly and offers a nice airflow and gentle sound... not too loud... not too quiet.... juuuuust Right👍It will be easy to clean this fan blades as needed and it was a great price. For those who are fussy about a decent oscelsting pedistal fan for the summer heat or for sleeping this fan is your pick!
customer_reviews.author: Krissa

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan, fast/easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan! It's attractive and takes up very little floor space. It also moves a lot of air. Noise: It's reasonably quiet, but I like white noise. I measured the sound, and it's 60 dB when directly next to the fan, and ~50 dB across the room. For reference, a library is 30 dB, a refrigerator running is 40-50 dB, and AC units are around 60-70 dB. One important thing to note is that you have to clean the fan periodically, or it won't pull as much air through. The dust will build up behind the fan and on the blades, reducing it's output. Cleaning it takes about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: nice fan, well made
customer_reviews.text: well constructed fan no flimsy plastic mount or pole ,steel pole heavy base only down fall is when its on high its slow like its on medium speed , very quite operation 4 star because of fan speed just seem to go fast enough on high
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier construction and a much better look to them
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are a few dollars more than the type you get at Walmart, but you can clearly see the difference. Much sturdier construction and a much better look to them. I'm glad I game them a try.
customer_reviews.author: John Brezina

customer_reviews.title: Quality and design perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! It looks and operates exactly like the description. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julia L

customer_reviews.title: Fan is constantly surging like wind is blowing thru it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these fan since most of the reviews were good, i threw the boxes away because i didnt know it was even possible to get a bad fan!( my fault!) They are the worst, they constantly sound like wind is blowing thru them but very little air comes out, i would not purchase them!
customer_reviews.author: glmap

customer_reviews.title: Low is plenty
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 weeks now.I keep it right next to my bed(head).Low is plenty for me,I love the fact that the controls are on the front-so I can just reach over and turn it off.This is a quiet fan,and well made.I am glad that this is the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Barb

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to put together. Not the easiest, but I was able to put it together in about 15 min. It's quiet too. Not a fan (pun intended) of where the buttons are. It's kinda awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Meggypoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This fan works very well for me. It arrived in excellent condition and was fairly easy to assemble even with my low skill level. I use it frequently in hot weather. It's very quiet so doesn't interfere with conversations or media usage.
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Navas

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well priced fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan. Solid and metal, easy to assemble, nice controls and really good air distribution. The only reason I have not given it a full 5 stares is that it is a little louder than I like. It starts off quietly, but within a minute it speeds up and the sound increases. Enough so that it drowns out the sound of rain but not so much that I can't still heard the dog snore 10 feet away. Hope this helps. I do recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: becky moody

customer_reviews.title: I had one larger version of the same product
customer_reviews.text: I had one larger version of the same product before. It was bigger. I would much prefer the larger model. It's okay if it costs more. This one is a bit too small for the space it occupies. And the old one was so much stronger!
customer_reviews.author: Luz Maria

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but weaker than expected.
customer_reviews.text: As the title of my review says, it works, but it's a little weaker than expected. I have another fan in my room that cost $20 more, but it seems to blow 50% more air than this one.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Truth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together. Very little noise! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, shipping was wonderful too. It was very easy to put together! You only need one screwdriver and it's very easy to follow the instruction booklet provided by the manufacturer. The wind it produces is wonderful, has 3 speeds. It's not very loud, something on the level as white noise. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kenza Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Sit close to this fan if you want to be fanned.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fan and it oscillates. Minus two stars because I can’t feel even a whisper of a breeze at six feet away on the highest setting. If you need a fan that you sit directly in front of, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Umm Bloop

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, but not very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, but not very powerful. Was going to use for living room, but it just does not blow hard enough. Moved it to my kids room (20' x 20') and it works GREAT in there, so no problem. Not too loud or anything, works fine in small/medium room.
customer_reviews.author: Shimmeez

customer_reviews.title: Not the fan I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Assembly and cleaning a nightmare. It's not very effective. Not very cold. Two people neeed to install unless you like wasting hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adams

customer_reviews.title: Just dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I honestly feel like I could have taken $15 to Family Dollar and gotten a better fan. I can't believe how many good reviews this POS has gotten. It sounds as if its speeding up and slowing down constantly and in no where close to quiet. I bought 2 like an idiot and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old School Fan
customer_reviews.text: Old school fan. Metal everythings except the fan blade it is a thin plastic. Easy to put together. Does not come with a remote for the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I really can't comment on the longevity of this fan because I've only had it for a couple of months. So far I am very happy with it. It cools so well that I have to turn it down sometimes. It's not overly loud either, just enough to add a little white noise for sleeping. That is my primary use...bedtime, so it should last a long time. The base adds a lot of stability to it and enough weight to keep it from tipping over (even on carpet).
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together even without looking at instructions. Very strong and a friend even inquired about it. I love it, it's been saving me money already not needing an air conditioner. Strong and 3 levels, easy to clean and break down. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Studart

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and I am NOT someone who has an easy time putting things together. It cools the room fine and is not loud. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Xqqsmeok

customer_reviews.title: Motor is Defective
customer_reviews.text: This fan seemed like a good buy at first, but then I noticed that there is an issue with the motor. It runs normally and then the fan speeds up and slows down unexpectedly. It bothers me when I have the fan on and I’m trying to sleep. The assembly instructions were also confusing. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan , easy to put together. Fast service,great price for the product. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty standard
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fan and works well but is pretty standard and comparable to anything you'd buy in store. I mostly just use it for air circulation and noise in our bedroom while sleeping at night.
customer_reviews.author: KMaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for a low price
customer_reviews.text: This fan doesn't blow me away (ba dum tsss) but it gets the job done. The biggest potential downside is that it's pretty loud for how much of a breeze it produces. I like having fans for white noise so it doesn't bother me, but it might bother some. Overall it does a decent job of keeping the air moving in my room and didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardine

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of them and they both are noisy. On low settings they get louder then quieter and louder. It sounds like a prop plane taking off. Wouldn't recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assembly, takes about 10 minutes. Very quiet, nice air flow. Simple design, much like the fans i have had in the past. I don't need a remote control for a fan :P, so this is perfect for my needs. I liked it so much, I bought another, can't beat the price and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: LarrySmola

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Windy Access to Controls
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. Fan gives off good air flow. I wish controls were on the back, since you have to get up close and have air blowing in your face to reach the controls to adjust speed or turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: It's powerful (low setting feels like the high on our last fan)
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to buy this fan, but after reading the reviews decided to give it a shot. It's powerful (low setting feels like the high on our last fan), and incredibly sturdy. A lot of standing fans have flimsy bases, but not this one. It's not going anywhere, and we love it. Also, the oscillation is consistent and not noisey. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Haña

customer_reviews.title: A fan that doesn’t fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought to cool down a studio apt in the summer. I’m a poor college student so I opted for this cheaper option - seeing it had decent reviews. The fan does NOTHING. It can be on the high setting & I can stand directly in front of it & I will feel absolutely no air flow. How does that happen? No clue. Can’t be called a fan if it fans nothing. Additionally, the cord is too small so the “fan” has to be directly in front of an outlet. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not a name brand you'll recognize, and it IS a bit pricey, it's well worth the money. The air flow is great and it's not too noisy. I've used it non-stop since February and it's still going strong. Downside is, as other customers stated, the actual motor weighs a lot and if you don't keep your screws tight, the head will just aim down. Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Da_Zeaz

customer_reviews.title: works great. it's not spectacular
customer_reviews.text: you get exactly what most anybody considering this kind of fan would expect. works great. it's not spectacular. it's not mean to be. but it's nice to get exactly what you'd expect these days. that's why i gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Igor R.

customer_reviews.title: Runs great, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 70's and have arthritis in my hands. This was the easiest fan to put together that I was able to do it myself. Runs great, very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Nana46

customer_reviews.title: Overall works fine. The up and down tilt does not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall works fine. The up and down tilt does not work as well as I would like- both the range of motion and how solid it feels. I never use oscillating mode.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Floor Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan really stirs the air, yet is pretty quiet even on high setting. Very sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is powerful and it integrates into my bedroom really nicely. I keep it on the lowest setting all the time, don't even need to go higher! I think it's pretty quiet. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: ixitheunicorn

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Why do I even believe the reviews on here anymore? This is garbage thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: good purchase and value
customer_reviews.text: work great so far. good white noise for sleeping too. good power. ordered 2 and both are working well 2 months in. sometimes a little loud if i'm watching tv, but great for cooling.
customer_reviews.author: mel bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Works well and not too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Bebete

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan for my sister. She likes it, especially because I got it for her right before a heat wave hit. But she says every once in a while it makes a strange noise when it’s on low. All things considered, it was a good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be fine
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because I have not used it a great deal. It was easy to snap the guard on and it seems to work fine. Since I will no longer need it until next year now due to the weather change I really can't give it a good test to make sure it will last
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and Carry . Be it Patio or room gives soothing breeze
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. If you're looking for mighty power, this fan it not it. It's calm and quiet and does a pretty good job as long as it isn't blistering hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together within 5 mins. Stands pretty tall and is good at blowing. Not the quietest fan ever but still good. Also wouldn’t say it’s the best at blowing so much air but it does a good amount at the highest speed. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cooling power and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, it took me about 10 minutes to put together. It's very quiet compared to the tiny, metal, desk sized one I had before. It's very easy to adjust and feels extremely study. I'm very happy with this fan purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi005

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan. Keeps up with big name brands.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even need to put it on anything higher than low! Its quiet, puts out a lot of air, and so easy to assemble. And it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chovanec

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly well made floor fan for a very good price! It works as advertised but is not very quiet. The assembly was easy and the clips not the fan guard allows you to easily open it to clean the blades. I would recommend this fan for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ndepano

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fan
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t too loud was easy to assemble just wish it came with a remote control so I don’t have to get up to control to fan speeds
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy- also giving it away as gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the summer months. Quiet high powered fan that provides a pleasant white noise to help me sleep through the night. My fluffy cats don't seem to mind it either. I wonder if it helps them stay cool. I ordered several more to give away as housewarming gifts (everyone can use a fan!)
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Speed

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Works great, I always have it on low and can't hear it but I definitely feel the wind blowing. It is pretty heavy so not a fan I would move around much, but also makes it very sturdy and seem like a good quality fan.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I just received this yesterday, I bought it because ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday, I bought it because of the reviews. I wish this fan had stronger blowing capabilities, not as cooling as I hoped for. I will keep, but will buy an additional more powerful one.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and it's quieter than my ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: SharonC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan just wished it was a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Spitty

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, but not the quality I expected. Works well though.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona S.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very glad of this during the recent heatwave. It works well, and is good value.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Have bought much better since
customer_reviews.text: After having this fan for a couple months I have bought other fans that are much better. This fan isn't powerful at all and the plug is messed up if you plug it in it won't work unless you wiggle it and pull it to one side. I've tried multiple outlets. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ,HollyL

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the money. I've had more cheaply-made ones that I paid more for. It's just tall enough to reach above our bed at night. Not too loud either.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Eden

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's room & he is enjoying it. Keeps him cool during the day & at night while he sleeps. He's very hot natured so this fan usually runs non-stop & it's very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kittep

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Much louder than the vertical cylinder fans. Great airflow volume. Heavy base keeps it sturdy. Took a little while for shipping but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't really move a bunch of air like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Ya its ok, it doesn't really move a bunch of air like I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: jkrcmar

customer_reviews.title: We live in Arizona.  It runs all day and all night.  My only issue is whether to buy another.  It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Light, puts out a lot of air. Clearly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey Island Travelers

customer_reviews.title: I like the white noise
customer_reviews.text: I like the white noise, which is mainly what I got it for. But it creates a nice effective breeze as well (its true purpose?). Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for my needs, hot summer and this one is quite yet it moves alot of air!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not for distances
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong. You need to be at point blank range to feel the breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Logibear64

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves this fan . His other was alltaped up
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good wind with a good price
customer_reviews.text: Smooth sounding fan. Not loud like some I’ve had but not too quiet that you don’t know it’s on. The base on this fan is more solid than any stand up fan I have owned. It was simple to put together and the wind from it on the highest setting is as strong as any fan I’ve owned with one exception. I once bought a massive stand fan that was so strong and loud it’d blow anything in the room away that wasn’t weighted down. Buy this fan and u won’t be disappointed. Best price quality point too..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together, and does what I need it to do. Arrived quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: never order again do not like this this i do not get right  order what my money pay for
customer_reviews.text: got my fan today hope everything is in box still have not receive my sreaws for my table really should not take this long call thank you and this fan does not have remote control
customer_reviews.author: Anita Parker

customer_reviews.title: Solid fan. A snap to put together and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid fan. A snap to put together and the base is significantly heavier than thin sheet metal bases that usually come with floor fans. Stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: jebbard

customer_reviews.title: Best fan I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fan running since I bought it in June and it’s currently January. It’s quiet but so powerful. Best fan I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan saved my life this last summer when I had no AC, worked great
customer_reviews.author: Paige Luna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful fan BUT it wobbly. Had tightened pole to base several times - still wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Nice level of white noise for sleeping
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Good air flow
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice wind velocity, and easy to assemble. I have this on my screened porch and it really provides just the right air movement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect. Its small but it really blows well. It was easy to assemble and I haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solid quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solid quiet fan. Easy to put together and have had zero problems with this fan. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan on my deck no mosquitoes and a nice breeze
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great fan, will buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this fan I needed one for my family room, it’s not noisey and works great.
customer_reviews.author: pamela luna

customer_reviews.title: Saves on A/C by circulating air at mid-level of room
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to get air circulation at mid-level height. Loved it so much I bought another one two days later.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Gruszka

customer_reviews.title: but I still like to have a fan by the bed at night
customer_reviews.text: My old fan died - I'm not getting hot flashes anymore, but I still like to have a fan by the bed at night. This one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Becke Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but weak fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is weak. We bought it but it doesn't move air in any way that made a difference in our warm house. Sure, the fan is quiet but it's not helpful if it's quiet but weak. We bought it to replace a Lasko fan that worked fine but was kind of loud. Unfortunately, had to return it, which sucked because return shipping was 1/3 the original price.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, even at this price point
customer_reviews.text: While this fan works, it is neither quiet nor does it move a lot of air. The blades that come with it are so flimsy they often bend while the fan is running, causing a decrease in air flow and an unpleasant noise. Would not recommend, even at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, lightweight and quiet! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The very best stand up fan I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: bigrick

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this ocillating fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is excellent at moving air. It is extremely quiet and well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy quiet fan. Great for sleeping. Bought a Lasko prior to buying this fan. The Lasko jingles, whines and is too noisy to use while sleeping. The Lasko, however, is more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan was very easy to set up It works very quietly and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome very sturdy fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Blows a lot of air and is made sturdy definitely a great buy. Im glad I got one.
customer_reviews.author: roger knapp
